attributes.title: DO NOT GET THIS APP
attributes.review: the morning after i downloading this app i decided to do a load of laundry. naturally, this load contained socks. to my horror upon opening the dryer after this load was completed, i found that all of my socks were missing. i even sent my son into the dryer to search for them and sadly he was lost to the laundry. thankfully, i still had some clean socks in the sock drawer to wear that day. flash forward a week and it was time to do some laundry again, the machine is done drying my clothes. i open the dryer once more and my socks have disappeared again. this time i send the family dog in to retrieve them, but he vanishes as well. now i have no clean socks and am forced to wear my tennis shoes WITHOUT SOCKS. i go to my local target in search of new socks seeing as mine have disappeared. and there were no socks in sight there either. how am i supposed to survive without my socks. just as i am crying and on the verge of a mental breakdown about the disappearance of my son, family dog, and worse MY SOCKS there is a knock on the door. i open in and am shocked to find two giant socks. they explain that they are actually my son and dog. they were taken from my house and sedated. they told me the last thing they remember is waking up on my front doorstep as socks. and the worst part isn’t even that my dog and son have been taken from me and turned into socks....they were turned into socks embroidered with the words “Official Trump 2020 App”. please do not get this app unless you want your family to turn into trump supporting socks.
